dextools.description: DEXTools MCP server for comprehensive DeFi market analysis, providing real-time data on trending pools, token prices, liquidity metrics, security audits, and blockchain information across 80%+ of major blockchains.

tools.name: get_trending_pools
tools.description: Get currently trending 'Hot Pairs' on a blockchain - the most popular and active trading pairs

tools.name: get_top_gainers
tools.description: Get tokens with highest positive price changes - the biggest winners in the market

tools.name: get_top_losers
tools.description: Get tokens with most significant negative price changes - the biggest losers in the market

tools.name: get_pool_details
tools.description: Get comprehensive details for a specific liquidity pool including metadata, trading pairs, and statistics

parameters.pool_address: string - The contract address of the liquidity pool (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_pool_price
tools.description: Get real-time price information for a token pair in a specific liquidity pool

parameters.pool_address: string - The contract address of the liquidity pool (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_pool_liquidity
tools.description: Get current liquidity data and Total Value Locked (TVL) for a specific pool

parameters.pool_address: string - The contract address of the liquidity pool (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_pool_score
tools.description: Get DEXTools score for a specific pool - a comprehensive rating based on multiple factors

parameters.pool_address: string - The contract address of the liquidity pool (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_token_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific token including metadata, social links, and basic stats

parameters.token_address: string - The contract address of the token (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_token_security_audit
tools.description: Get security audit results for a token's smart contract including potential risks and flags

parameters.token_address: string - The contract address of the token (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_token_price
tools.description: Get current price information for a specific token across all its trading pairs

parameters.token_address: string - The contract address of the token (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_token_score
tools.description: Get DEXTools score for a specific token - a comprehensive rating based on multiple factors

parameters.token_address: string - The contract address of the token (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_all_pools_for_token
tools.description: Find all liquidity pools associated with a token across all DEXs on the blockchain

parameters.token_address: string - The contract address of the token (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)
parameters.from_date: string (optional) - Start date for historical data (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, default: 2024-01-01T00:00:00)
parameters.to_date: string (optional) - End date for historical data (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, default: 2024-12-31T23:59:59)

tools.name: get_blockchain_info
tools.description: Get blockchain information for a specific chain including network details and statistics

tools.name: get_supported_blockchains
tools.description: Get list of all supported blockchains by the DEXTools API

tools.name: get_pool_liquidity_locks
tools.description: Check for locked liquidity in a pool - critical for identifying potential 'rug pulls' and ensuring liquidity security

parameters.pool_address: string - The contract address of the liquidity pool (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: get_token_locks
tools.description: Check for locked token allocations (team tokens, vesting schedules) - helps assess risk of large token dumps

parameters.token_address: string - The contract address of the token (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)

tools.name: find_new_pools_in_range
tools.description: Discover new liquidity pools created within a specific time window - perfect for finding new opportunities early

parameters.from_date: string (optional) - Start date for search range (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, default: 2024-01-01T00:00:00)
parameters.to_date: string (optional) - End date for search range (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, default: 2024-12-31T23:59:59)
parameters.page_size: integer (optional) - Number of results per page (default: 100)

tools.name: find_new_tokens_in_range
tools.description: Find new token contracts created within a specific time window - allows analysis before tokens have liquidity

parameters.from_date: string (optional) - Start date for search range (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, default: 2024-01-01T00:00:00)
parameters.to_date: string (optional) - End date for search range (format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS, default: 2024-12-31T23:59:59)
parameters.page_size: integer (optional) - Number of results per page (default: 100)

tools.name: get_dex_list_on_chain
tools.description: Get all Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs) indexed by DEXTools on a specific blockchain

parameters.page_size: integer (optional) - Number of results per page (default: 100)

tools.name: get_dex_factory_details
tools.description: Get low-level information about a DEX's factory contract - the smart contract responsible for creating new trading pairs

parameters.factory_address: string - The contract address of the DEX factory (Ethereum: 0x..., Solana: base58)
